description:
100% Open Source Toolkit for Large Language Models: Train, Tune, Chat on your own Machine

Transformer Lab is a free, open-source LLM workspace that you can run on your own computer. It is designed to go beyond what most modern open LLM applications allow. Using Transformer Lab you can easily finetune, evaluate, export and test LLMs across different inference engines and platforms.
What's Changed
- Fix diffusion calls to also include experiment id by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/788
- Add batched generation button and modal for audio by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/792
- Login with WorkOS in cloud mode by @mashcroft3 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/790
- Fix local dataset card buttons by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/794
- Fix some routes that dont have credentials included by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/797
- Fix/experiment id name by @mina-parham in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/795
- Remove workflows from sidebar by @dadmobile in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/801
- add tasks in side panel and hide others by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/802
- add authfetch for recipe calls by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/805
- Remote launch tasks by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/806
- Add check for prettier (linter) to enable latest changes update before merging by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/804
- Add a separate polling terminal for auth outputs in tasks by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/807
- Fix healthz check app init by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/809
- Create tasks and launch separately , also adds upload directory and edit tasks by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/811
- add monaco editor to create task by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/816
- Added option to update Hugging Face credentials in UI by @salsina in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/798
- Add WANDB Run URL button for jobs in tasks by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/817
- Hide settings from Sidebar in GPU Orchestration mode by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/818
- Add tasks library by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/814
- Don't show current model running if in GPU Orchestration mode by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/812
- Switch to GPU Orchestration from TLAB by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/819
- View Artifacts and Checkpoints in the Tasks jobs list by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/815
- Add loading menu item when experiments are loading by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/824
- wrap task run buttons better by @aliasaria in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/823
- Fix saving of notes when logged in by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/825
- Load Task List and Jobs List separately by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/826
- Allow Remote Jobs to be Stopped and Allow completion without lab facade by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/827
- Separate out job create and launch for remote jobs by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/829
- Add change task library behaviour by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/830
- Fix state reset in Task Library file viewer by @deep1401 in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/833
New Contributors
- @mashcroft3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/790
- @salsina made their first contribution in https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/pull/798
Full Changelog: https://github.com/transformerlab/transformerlab-app/compare/v0.23.1...v0.24.0
